marklogic.body:
MadAussie, wherever you are, you messed up my "game" which was aimed towards a certain rival team... called me out, now I can't play that game. Wish you just asked what my deal was, first. No worries... ...and how 'bout those Sydney Blue Sox? Not too good; it's been all Perth Heat since the ALB changed 2 years back... prior to that, Victoria Aces w/ 18 Claxton Shileds (I was at the game they won theirÂ 18th, in Melbourne v Adelaide - only $15 per ticket day of game!!!).
Cheers.
